subject.normal: [grails-dev] Plugin depending on a plugin having hyphen '-' in its name

headers.subject: Re: [grails-dev] Plugin depending on a plugin having hyphen '-' in its name

quote.quotepara: Yes the transitive resolution only works if you use the 'release' plugin to install to a maven repo and then specify the dependency in BuildConfig

body.para: I have just tried to install the release plugin and publish the plugin, but I get class not found exceptions because release plugin dependencies are not resolved properly: only maven-ant-tasks and http-builder jars are retrieved from repository, but httpclient for example not. What I am doing wrong? I have installed the plugin with install-plugin command. Grails version is 1.3.7
